name: Salazar
overview: Salazar, located in Mexico, is a boulderer's paradise known for its unique volcanic rock formations. With excellent crimps and overhangs, it offers a challenging experience. Best visited during the dry season, it has gained a reputation for its high-quality boulders.

Salazar, ubicado en México, es un paraíso para los escaladores de bloque, conocido por sus formaciones de roca volcánica únicas. Con excelentes agarres y desplomes, ofrece una experiencia desafiante. Mejor visitado durante la temporada seca, ha ganado reputación por sus bloques de alta calidad.
